targets.expr: max(sum(jvm_memory_used_bytes{job=~"$job", instance=~"$instance", jvm_memory_type="heap"}) by (instance) / sum(jvm_memory_limit_bytes{job=~"$job", instance=~"$instance", jvm_memory_type="heap"}) by (instance))

max(sum(jvm_memory_used_bytes{job=~"$job", instance=~"$instance", jvm_memory_type="non_heap"}) by (instance) / sum(jvm_memory_limit_bytes{job=~"$job", instance=~"$instance", jvm_memory_type="non_heap"}) by (instance))

sum by(instance) (rate(http_server_request_duration_seconds_count{job=~"$job", instance=~"$instance", http_response_status_code=~"5.+"}[5m])) / on(instance) sum by(instance) (rate(http_server_request_duration_seconds_count{job=~"$job", instance=~"$instance"}[5m]))

sum(rate(http_client_requests_seconds_count{app=~"$app", cluster=~"$cluster", instance=~"$instance", pod=~"$pod", status=~"5.."}[5m])) by (status) / sum(rate(http_client_requests_seconds_count{app=~"$app", cluster=~"$cluster", instance=~"$instance", pod=~"$pod"}[5m])) by (status)
histogram_quantile($percentile, sum(rate(http_client_requests_seconds_bucket{app=~"$app", cluster=~"$cluster", instance=~"$instance", pod=~"$pod"}[5m])) by (le, outcome))
